Hydras/Perceptor::

"We shall know"replied Perceptor

"Well... as you can see this base isn't safe... so we will need a new 
one, That will be your task, Perceptor, I'll give you the coordinates 
and all stuff the you will need, the others check that no one remain 
here and If I remember rightly we have a prisioner and I need that 
you move it too the decepticon base,my old base while the new one 
it's done... After the black Fortress will be done: this and the 
decepticon base will be demolished and materials used to built other 
stuff... is this clear?"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : SharpClaw/Wolfenstein : :
> 
> After the order was given by Hydras, Wolf and SharpClaw report to 
the command chamber.
> 
> Wolfenstein: I wonder what this is about.
> 
> SharpClaw: We shall soon see.
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras::
> 
> Looking to Maxima, the predacon leader stopped and said "I'm very 
> sorry to stop this, my dear, but we have bussines to attend and 
> after that... we can chat calmly and alone"Hydras opened his com 
> link and said "FOr all predacons, Come to command room, I have so 
> messages for you and new strategies to discuss..."
